授業方法: Classes will include discussions, presentations, pair work and group work. Assignments may require the use of a computer and online sites.

第33回: Course sessions listed above are subject to change in accordance to student needs and any changes to the university calendar.

The purpose of this course is for students to develop their English language knowledge (vocabulary, grammar, and discourse) and language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) within an all-English communicative environment to enable them to meet the academic requirements of study abroad programs.
